description:

Song of the Valley

Song of the Valley

Click and drag to create lines
Click and drag Clouds
[ ] - increase/decrease quantize duration
X - Show/Hide Instructions
U - Undo Platform
C - Clear Platforms
A - Add Cloud
S - Minus Cloud (Until 1)
TAB - change platform type
